snippet: Dollar General takes its bid for Family Dollar directly to shareholders. | Microsoft near a deal for the maker of Minecraft. | Fed’s newly proposed rules put pressure on banks. | Detroit clears a bankruptcy hurdle.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Dollar General Goes Hostile
